thread.title: £4bn to be spent easing congestion on major motorways
thread.title_full: £4bn to be spent easing congestion on major motorways | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: £4bn to be spent easing congestion on major motorways
text:
Traffic queues on the M25 motorway Credit: Steve Parsons/PA Wire Highways England today promised to invest more than four billion pounds on major roads across the south east.
As part of a nationwide project, the A3, M25, M3, A31 and A27 will benefit from improvements, which will include one hundred and twenty miles of extra lanes.
The planned works are due to be completed by 2020.
